text: Late dinner: pizza + coke. Heartburn at night and restless sleep.
Kal raat neend nahi aayi. 2am ko uth gayi. Subah chai pi. Feeling anxious and chest tight.
Dinner: paneer bhurji + rotis. Got sleepy after eating. Stomach bloated.
Oats with banana and walnuts. Knee soreness when walking downstairs. Not sad, just tired.
Tea with 2 tsp sugar. Afternoon headache behind eyes. Snappy mood.
